description: This file defines the AuthActivity class for an Android app, which manages user authentication screens including login and signup. It hosts the login fragment and handles navigation to the main activity after authentication.

classes.name: AuthActivity
classes.description: An Android activity that hosts login and signup UI fragments and facilitates navigation into the main app upon successful login.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the content view, and loads the login fragment if no previous state exists.

methods.name: proceedToApp
methods.description: Starts the MainActivity and finishes the current AuthActivity, navigating the user into the main application after authentication.
